scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n CLIENT,SERVER -c blue,green "npm run dev --workspace httplogger.client" "dotnet run --launch-profile https --project ./HttpLogger.Server"

scripts.clean: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules data HttpLogger.Server/data HttpLogger.Server/bin HttpLogger.Server/obj HttpLogger.Server/HttpLogger.Server.csproj.user;  npm run linuxclean --workspace httplogger.client
